one of the best coop puzzle games ive played the story is very comical but makes sense the puzzles overal make sense and feel good to work out and i really like the breakdowns at the end of each level are nice too incase you accidentally solved something or didnt know how you get to the answer the dlc is basically more of the original game which is exactly what id want from something like this lol

generally i do recommend this game some riddles are a bit convoluted though and honestly the hints are mostly useless  if it is available in your native language play it in that i didnt and some word puzzles were a bit harder to comprehend that way though i dont know if the last ones wouldve been easier in my native language  generally a nice little game though unsure if full prize is worth it to be honest thats for everyone to decide for themselves
